title: Mud Bud
summaries: The Mud Bud is a post-Plantera pet-summoning item which can be purchased from the Zoologist for 50 GC after defeating Plantera. It summons Plantero, a miniature version of Plantera, that follows the player. The pet keeps pace with the player by flying in a manner similar to Plantera's second form while emitting a trail of falling leaves that are affected by wind.

statistics.Buy: 50 GC
statistics.Sell: 10 GC
